column10: the daughter of the late william g. gib and alice e. (cruea) weaver. norma was a waitress at the former colonial manor restaurant as well as lesters diner. she also was a clerk at dollar general
column11: retiring in 1994 due to a disability. norma found great joy in going to the bryan senior center

column15: but she really enjoyed her trips to nashville with her family. surviving are her six children
